Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1131.jpg'}
{3: 'A deafening alarm echoes throughout the research institute.'}
{3: 'The number on the distant screen flashes, counting down rapidly.'}
{3: 'Before the injured time traveler can speak again, he is buried by the falling ceiling.'}
{3: 'Right after, red particles and monsters flood out of the ceiling cracks.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiSHanshuoNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: '...Hetero-Creatures?', 3: '10', 4: '...The Punishing Virus?', 5: '11'}
{3: 'When you see the red particles, this word just pops into your head.'}
{3: 'As soon as you see the enemy, this word pops into your head.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: "It's the Punishers and the Corrupted!", 4: '1', 18: '100006474'}
{3: 'No time to think—you are no match for them in your current state.'}
{2: 'Got any weapons?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: "There's a secret compartment in that wall.", 4: '1', 18: '100006475'}
{3: 'As you run with Ishmael to the weapon storage, you hear a familiar voice.'}
{3: 'Ta·3T-class, who left earlier, has come back with what looks like weapons.'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'The Punishers are here! Teleport out now!', 4: '1', 18: '100006477'}
{3: 'You catch the gauntlet and hilt Ta·3T-class threw. You put on the gauntlet and press the trigger, aiming at the monster behind you.'}
{3: 'An orange-red beam fires from the gauntlet, hitting the monster.'}
{3: 'The monster is thrown back several meters, a huge wound opening up on its body.'}
{3: 'But then, red particles swirl around it, and its wound starts to heal.'}
{2: '****!', 3: '36', 4: "We won't take them down fast enough.", 5: '36'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Ta, "Gray Raven" doesn\'t have a terminal yet—we\'re stuck here!', 4: '1', 18: '100006478'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "The portal won't activate either!", 4: '1', 18: '100006480'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'Take "Gray Raven" to the prep area, get a new terminal, and then get out of here together.', 4: '2', 18: '100006481'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'I have to get to the time mainframe.', 4: '2', 18: '100006484'}
{3: 'Then, Ta·3T-class looks at you.'}
{3: 'Her eyes show a complicated look with a hint of anticipation.'}
{2: '(Anticipation?)', 3: '51'}
{3: 'Afterward, she leaves again without looking back.'}
{3: 'Another explosion echoes, shaking the ground. Warning lights flash through red particles, turning everything blood-red.'}
{2: 'Female Researcher', 3: 'Retreat, now!', 4: '1', 18: '100006487'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Young Time Traveler', 3: 'Why?! Why has the Corrupted broken in?!', 4: '1', 18: '100006488'}
{2: 'Young Time Traveler', 3: "I've got to get out of here!", 4: '1', 18: '100006489'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Middle-aged Time Traveler', 3: "**** it! I'll fight you all till I drop!", 4: '2', 18: '100006490'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Screams, roars, and howls mix together, composing a chaotic symphony from the abyss.'}
{3: 'This place turns into hell on earth instantly.'}
{2: "Let's go."}
{1: '1', 3: 'Ishmael grits her teeth. First, her professor, now her colleagues...'}
{3: "She can't take any more of this."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1125.jpg'}
{3: 'Screams echo everywhere, making the corridor feel endless.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'The prep area is just ahead...', 4: '1', 18: '100006492'}
{2: "(Something doesn't feel right)", 3: '82'}
{3: 'You hear the sounds of fighting coming from the next room.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Get down, now!', 3: '86'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{3: 'Without explaining much, you pull Ishmael down to the side.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryExplosionL.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Crash!'}
{3: 'The wall next to you is ripped apart, filling the corridor with dust.'}
{3: 'A feline Corrupted, almost three meters tall, stands in your way.'}
{3: 'The Corrupted is covered in wounds, with red mist coming out of the cuts.'}
{2: "I'll make an opening—jump on it when you see it."}
{3: 'You pull out the hilt and activate it, and a beam of light bursts out.'}
{2: 'It really is a lightsaber!', 3: '104', 4: "Let's go!", 5: '104'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySlash02.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: "You duck under the Corrupted's swing and slash upward, cutting off its arm. In one move, you get under its body."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab'}
{3: 'A blast from your gauntlet sends the Corrupted flying.'}
{3: 'Ishmael takes the chance and fires at the Corrupted. A light sphere comes out of the weapon, expanding and trapping the Corrupted.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDuihualiziEndWhite.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'The Corrupted and parts of the ceiling and walls are completely destroyed.'}
{3: 'You hold up your hand, signaling Ishmael for a high-five.'}
{3: "Even though she doesn't seem to get it, she follows you and raises her hand."}
{3: 'Your high-five echoes sharply.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiSHanshuoNew.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryHongBg.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1129.jpg'}
{3: "You run into different types of Corrupted along the way, but you get past them with Ishmael's help despite some close calls."}
{3: 'At the prep area, Ishmael grabs a time travel terminal and gives it to you.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: "The terminal's ready. Just activate it and you'll teleport away.", 4: '1', 18: '100006495'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "You'll arrive on a remote planet, one the Punishers haven't hit yet.", 4: '1', 18: '100006496'}
{2: 'What about you?', 3: '148'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "I can't go. They need help with the mainframe.", 4: '1', 18: '100006498'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "The time mainframe can't be destroyed. It holds everything we've done.", 4: '1', 18: '100006499'}
{2: "Ta doesn't want you to go there.", 3: '153'}
{2: "Then we'll go together.", 3: '156'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'You got dragged into this. I can\'t let you risk your life for "Shrike".', 4: '1', 18: '100006501'}
{2: "I love sticking my nose in other people's business.", 3: '159', 4: "You helped me before. Now I'm returning the favor.", 5: '159'}
{3: "Ishmael quickly realizes she can't change your mind."}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "We don't have much time. Let's go.", 4: '1', 18: '100006503'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'If things go bad, use the terminal and get out.', 4: '1', 18: '100006504'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1128.jpg'}
{3: 'Eventually, you arrive at the mainframe with Ishmael.'}
{3: 'The floor of the whole area is covered in a red mist.'}
{3: 'A strange humanoid floats in the air, attacking the mainframe while red particles drift around it.'}
{3: 'Most of the staff are already down, with just a few people desperately trying to protect the mainframe.'}
{3: 'The Punisher strikes a heavy blow, and the people defending the mainframe fall one by one—'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest.prefab'}
{3: 'Ishmael runs forward to help the fallen Ta when the red figure slowly turns, seemingly having spotted her...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiBegin.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryHongBg.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiEnd.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiBegin.prefab'}
{3: 'You only have time to activate the terminal and grab Ishmael.'}
{3: 'Blue teleportation light and the flames of the explosion fill your vision.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1017.jpg'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Before you even open your eyes, you can feel and smell again.'}
{3: 'You feel grass under you and smell soil.'}
{3: 'Memories from before the teleportation start coming back.'}
{3: "You sit up quickly, realizing you aren't in the research institute anymore."}
{3: 'You look toward where the sound comes from and see Ishmael lying on the grass.'}
{3: 'She is groaning in pain, with wounds from the explosion on her back.'}
{3: 'Ishmael points weakly at her emergency kit, then pulls out some medicine.'}
{3: 'After you give Ishmael the painkillers, her face relaxes.'}
{2: 'Let me patch you up.', 3: '218'}
{3: 'Like someone who has done it a million times, you clean, disinfect, treat, and bandage her wound.'}
{3: 'Even after all that, Ishmael is still shaking a little.'}
{3: 'You move a little more gently.'}
{2: 'Is this your first time being this badly hurt?', 3: '225'}
{3: 'She looks up upon hearing your question and answers without thinking.'}
{3: 'After a moment, she snaps out of it, looking both amused and confused.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'That was a weird question...', 4: '1', 18: '100006509'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Does anyone get hurt that often?', 4: '1', 18: '100006510'}
{2: "They'd have to be really unlucky.", 3: '233'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "You're very skilled at wound binding. Did you get hurt a lot before?", 4: '1', 18: '100006512'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Right, I forgot you lost your memory.', 4: '1', 18: '100006513'}
{3: 'After tying the bandage, you complete the dressing.'}
{2: 'What are you going to do now?', 3: '244'}
{3: 'Ishmael stares at the grassland, speaking after a brief pause.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "The time mainframe's never been destroyed before.", 4: '1', 18: '100006516'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'If the mainframe is destroyed, no one can time travel anymore.', 4: '1', 18: '100006517'}
{3: 'Remembering what happened at "Shrike" and how the institute and her friends were lost to her, Ishmael becomes sad again.'}
{3: "Even though she wasn't there long, the research institute has changed her life."}
{3: 'Those past events shaped her, and now, part of her feels empty.'}
{2: 'Are there other ways to time travel?', 3: '253'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'The truth is that "Shrike" was completed just three months ago.', 4: '1', 18: '100006518'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Ta's really talented. She improved the way we time travel.", 4: '1', 18: '100006519'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Before the research institute, no one could return from time travel.', 4: '1', 18: '100006520'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'We sent travelers out, all for an elusive hope.', 4: '1', 18: '100006521'}
{2: "Guess it's time to roll the die.", 3: '261'}
{3: "Ishmael's confused look makes you, who's suffering memory loss, unsure."}
{2: "It's... something used in games.", 3: '265'}
{2: 'You roll it, and it gives you a random outcome.', 3: '266'}
{2: 'It helps when you can\'t decide, sort of like "fortune-telling".', 3: '267'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'But, does such an item really exist?', 4: '1', 18: '100006525'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'You just roll it, follow what it says, and keep going... without worrying too much...', 4: '1', 18: '100006526'}
{2: "It's not the result that matters, but the act of rolling the die.", 3: '273'}
{2: 'The die is a "hope", and the path forward is in your heart.', 3: '274'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'The path forward... is in your heart...', 4: '1', 18: '100006527'}
{3: "Suddenly, the wind picks up. This wind, once rampaged against sails in raging storms and worn down vast mountain ranges, now gently caresses Ishmael's hair."}
{3: 'Her eyes reflect the twilight, like a setting sun.'}
{2: 'We can build another "Shrike", or we can...', 3: '279'}
{2: "Regardless, keep moving forward—that's what counts.", 3: '280'}
{3: 'She sees you pointing into the distance.'}
{2: 'At least we can still see the sunset.', 3: '282'}
{3: 'Ishmael looks in that direction.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg5101_12.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1123.jpg'}
{3: 'She sees a giant arc across the sky, bending light before it dips below the horizon.'}
{3: 'A sun slowly sets, filling the sky with warm shades.'}
{3: 'As one sun sets, another appears in the sky.'}
{3: 'The whole world turns amber, enveloping you both in that moment.'}
{3: "Ishmael's eyes slowly regain their light."}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "This is Andymion, where Ta's from...", 18: '100006529'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Ta told me her home has the best sunsets in the galaxy.', 18: '100006530'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: '"...Distant starlight eternally suspended overhead... A prolonged twilight that seems to last forever..."', 18: '100006531'}
{3: 'After Ta·3T-class mentioned her home, Ishmael looked up Andymion.'}
{3: "This planet's in a stable binary system. Andymion orbits one sun, and the other's too far to matter."}
{3: "Andymion's rings have minerals that reflect light, making them look like stars you can touch."}
{3: "But that's not the point."}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "A view like this doesn't exist in our time.", 18: '100006532'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "We're... back in time!", 18: '100006533'}
{3: "Ishmael's voice is full of excitement."}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Did you change where the terminal was going?', 18: '100006534'}
{2: 'No, I just hit the activation button.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg5101_12.jpg', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0.25'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'It has to be Ta. She changed our destination from the mainframe.', 4: '1', 18: '100006535'}
{3: "Determined, Ishmael goes to get her terminal but finds it's broken."}
{3: 'You give Ishmael your time travel terminal, and she smiles as she takes it.'}
{3: 'When "Shrike" was falling apart, she couldn\'t activate her terminal in time, so you got her out. Her terminal was destroyed.'}
{3: 'After what seems like forever, Ishmael finishes her inspection.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: "I've confirmed it. We're 40 years in the past.", 4: '1', 18: '100006536'}
{2: "Being back in time means we can rewrite history, doesn't it?", 3: '316'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'If we help "Shrike" start sooner or change its location, we might stop its destruction.', 4: '1', 18: '100006538'}
{2: "Let's go, then. Time for a new start.", 3: '319'}
{3: 'Ishmael smiles at you in the twilight.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Then let's save the world together.", 4: '1', 18: '100006539'}
{3: 'And so—'}
{3: 'The heroic team of the amnesiac "Gray Raven" and Wish-Mael is born.'}
